tuning_runs.notes: WITHIN BUDGET but MUCH WORSE score (-0.2080). Only 1 candidate/sample (diversity penalty). 2-src RMSE 45% worse than baseline.

hypothesis: 2023 paper: Weighted centroid in NM accelerates convergence for heat source localization. Weights inverse to function value bias search towards better regions.
key_finding: Weighted centroid NM HURTS both accuracy AND diversity. Custom NM implementation produced only 1 candidate per sample. Standard scipy NM is more robust and produces better results.
